mapper.select:
SELECT t.create_user, b.user_name AS userName, COUNT(1) AS tbNeed, SUM(CASE t.states WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS slNeed, SUM(CASE t.states WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS juNeed, SUM(CASE t.states WHEN 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dslNeed, SUM(CASE t.states WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wcNeed, sum(CASE WHEN ( SELECT a.states FROM gome_gmp_res_need a where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(a.create_time) AND a.create_time <=NOW() AND a.need_id=t.need_id )=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) as yNeed FROM gome_gmp_res_need t,gome_gmp_res_user b,gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE t.create_user=b.id and length(b.org_id) >= 4 AND o.org_id=left(b.org_id,4)
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND EXISTS (SELECT u.id FROM gome_gmp_res_user u,gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE u.org_id = o.org_id AND u.id = t.create_user and
o.org_id LIKE CONCAT(#{item},'%')
)
GROUP BY userName

SELECT need_id, title, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = n.priority_id) priority_name, create_time, plan_time, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'status' and item_id = n.states) statusName,create_user FROM gome_gmp_res_need n,gome_gmp_res_user b, gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE n.create_user=b.id and length(b.org_id) >= 4 AND o.org_id=left(b.org_id,4)
AND DATE_FORMAT(n.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(n.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND EXISTS (SELECT u.id FROM gome_gmp_res_user u,gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE u.org_id = o.org_id AND u.id = n.create_user and
o.org_id LIKE CONCAT(#{item},'%')
)
and n.create_user=#{createUser}

SELECT DISTINCT( SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM gome_gmp_res_project p, gome_gmp_res_user b,( SELECT LEFT(o.org_id, 4)org_id_bm, o.* FROM gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE LENGTH(o.org_id)>= 4 ) o WHERE p.is_commit = 1 AND p.bp_id = b.id AND b.org_id = o.org_id )AS sums, ( SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_user b,( SELECT LEFT(o.org_id,4)org_id_bm, o.* FROM gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE LENGTH(o.org_id)>= 4 ) o WHERE p.is_commit = 1 AND p.bp_id = b.id AND b.org_id = o.org_id AND p.schedule_id NOT IN(0, 5, 7, 9, 10, 11) and p.status_id=2 )AS jxz, ( SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_user b, ( SELECT LEFT(o.org_id, 4)org_id_bm,o.* FROM gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE LENGTH(o.org_id)>= 4 ) o WHERE p.is_commit = 1 AND p.bp_id = b.id AND b.org_id = o.org_id AND p.schedule_id =5 )AS ysx, ( SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_user b, ( SELECT LEFT(o.org_id, 4)org_id_bm,o.* FROM gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE LENGTH(o.org_id)>= 4 ) o WHERE p.is_commit = 1 AND p.bp_id = b.id AND b.org_id = o.org_id AND p.schedule_id =3 )AS fx, ( SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_user b,( SELECT LEFT(o.org_id,4)org_id_bm,o.* FROM gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE LENGTH(o.org_id)>= 4 ) o WHERE p.is_commit = 1 AND p.bp_id = b.id AND b.org_id = o.org_id AND p.schedule_id =4 )AS yq, ( SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_user b,( SELECT LEFT(o.org_id,4)org_id_bm,o.* FROM gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE LENGTH(o.org_id)>= 4 ) o WHERE p.is_commit = 1 AND p.bp_id = b.id AND b.org_id = o.org_id AND p.schedule_id =9 )AS zt, ( SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_user b,( SELECT LEFT(o.org_id,4)org_id_bm,o.* FROM gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE LENGTH(o.org_id)>= 4) o WHERE p.is_commit = 1 AND p.bp_id = b.id AND b.org_id = o.org_id AND p.schedule_id = 0 and p.status_id!=3 )AS wqd from gome_gmp_res_project p WHERE DATE_FORMAT(p.update_time,"%Y")= #{year} and p.is_commit=1

SELECT year from ( select x.pro_id, max(year) year from ( select DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y') year,pro_id from gome_gmp_res_project t where t.is_commit=1) x group by x.pro_id ) d
AND EXISTS ( SELECT u.id FROM gome_gmp_res_user u,gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE u.org_id = o.org_id and p.pro_id = d.pro_id and
o.org_id LIKE CONCAT(#{item},'%')
)
group by year

SELECT p.pro_id, p.title, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'statusId' and item_id = p.status_id) status_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = p.priority_id) priority_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'scheduleId' and item_id = p.schedule_id) schedule_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'actualize' and item_id = p.actualize) actualize_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(( select round(sum(work_period/(select sum(k.work_period) sum_period from gome_gmp_res_task k where k.pro_id = s.pro_id)*s.`schedule`/100)*100,1) from gome_gmp_res_task s where s.pro_id = p.pro_id),0),'%') percentage, p.plan_time, (select user_name from gome_gmp_res_user where id = p.bp_id) bp_name FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_user b,(SELECT LEFT(o.org_id,4)org_id_bm, o.* FROM gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE LENGTH(o.org_id)>= 4) o WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.is_commit = 1 AND p.bp_id = b.id AND b.org_id = o.org_id and DATE_FORMAT(p.update_time,"%Y")= #{year} group BY p.pro_id

SELECT p.pro_id,p.title, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'statusId' and item_id = p.status_id) status_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = p.priority_id) priority_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'scheduleId' and item_id = p.schedule_id) schedule_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'actualize' and item_id = p.actualize) actualize_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(( select round(sum(work_period/(select sum(k.work_period) sum_period from gome_gmp_res_task k where k.pro_id = s.pro_id)*s.`schedule`/100)*100,1) from gome_gmp_res_task s where s.pro_id = p.pro_id),0),'%') percentage, p.plan_time, (select user_name from gome_gmp_res_user where id = p.bp_id) bp_name FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_user b,(SELECT LEFT(o.org_id,4)org_id_bm, o.* FROM gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE LENGTH(o.org_id)>= 4 ) o WHERE p.is_commit = 1 AND p.bp_id = b.id AND b.org_id = o.org_id AND p.schedule_id NOT IN(0, 5, 7, 9, 10, 11) and p.status_id=2 and DATE_FORMAT(p.update_time,"%Y")= #{year} GROUP BY p.pro_id

SELECT p.pro_id,p.title, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type ='statusId' and item_id = p.status_id) status_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = p.priority_id) priority_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'scheduleId' and item_id = p.schedule_id) schedule_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'actualize' and item_id = p.actualize) actualize_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(( select round(sum(work_period/(select sum(k.work_period) sum_period from gome_gmp_res_task k where k.pro_id = s.pro_id)*s.`schedule`/100)*100,1) from gome_gmp_res_task s where s.pro_id = p.pro_id),0),'%') percentage, p.plan_time, (select user_name from gome_gmp_res_user where id = p.bp_id) bp_name FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_user b,( SELECT LEFT(o.org_id,4)org_id_bm, o.* FROM gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE LENGTH(o.org_id)>= 4 ) o
p.bp_id = b.id AND b.org_id = o.org_id
and DATE_FORMAT(p.update_time,"%Y")= #{year}
and p.schedule_id=#{scheduleId}
and p.status_id!=3
and p.is_commit = 1
group by p.pro_id

select (SELECT count(1) FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u WHERE 1=1 AND p.bp_id=u.id AND u.org_id=o.org_id AND p.schedule_id=5 AND p.is_commit=1 AND p.update_time >=#{startTime} AND p.update_time <=#{endTime} ) ysx, (SELECT count(1) from gome_gmp_res_project a,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u where 1=1 and a.bp_id=u.id AND u.org_id=o.org_id and a.schedule_id not in (0,5,7,9,10,11) AND a.is_commit=1 AND a.update_time >=#{startTime} AND a.update_time <=#{endTime} ) jxz , ( SELECT count(1) from gome_gmp_res_project b,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u where 1=1 AND b.bp_id=u.id and o.org_id=u.org_id AND b.is_commit=1 AND b.update_time >=#{startTime} AND b.update_time <=#{endTime} ) xz , (SELECT count(1) from gome_gmp_res_project c,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u where 1=1 AND c.bp_id=u.id and o.org_id=u.org_id AND c.schedule_id =3 AND c.is_commit=1 AND c.update_time >=#{startTime} AND c.update_time <=#{endTime} ) fx , (SELECT count(1) FROM gome_gmp_res_project d,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u WHERE 1=1 AND d.bp_id=u.id and o.org_id=u.org_id AND d.update_time!=d.create_time AND d.schedule_id=9 AND d.is_commit=1 AND d.update_time >=#{startTime} AND d.update_time <=#{endTime} ) zt , (select count(1) from gome_gmp_res_project e,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u where 1=1 AND e.bp_id=u.id and o.org_id=u.org_id AND date_add( CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 - DAYOFWEEK( CURDATE() )+ 2 DAY ) >=DATE_FORMAT(e.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AND date_add( CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 - DAYOFWEEK( CURDATE() )+ 2 + 6 DAY ) <=DATE_FORMAT(e.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AND e.is_commit=1 ) xzjh from DUAL

SELECT p.pro_id,p.title,(select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'statusId' and item_id = p.status_id) status_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = p.priority_id) priority_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'scheduleId' and item_id = p.schedule_id) schedule_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'actualize' and item_id = p.actualize) actualize_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(( select round(sum(work_period/(select sum(k.work_period) sum_period from gome_gmp_res_task k where k.pro_id = s.pro_id)*s.`schedule`/100)*100,1) from gome_gmp_res_task s where s.pro_id = p.pro_id ),0),'%') percentage, p.plan_time, (select user_name from gome_gmp_res_user where id = p.bp_id) bp_name FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u WHERE 1=1 AND p.bp_id=u.id and u.org_id=o.org_id AND p.schedule_id =#{scheduleId} AND p.is_commit=1 AND p.update_time >=#{startTime} AND p.update_time <=#{endTime} GROUP BY p.pro_id

SELECT p.pro_id,p.title,(select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'statusId' and item_id = p.status_id) status_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = p.priority_id) priority_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'scheduleId' and item_id = p.schedule_id) schedule_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'actualize' and item_id = p.actualize) actualize_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(( select round(sum(work_period/(select sum(k.work_period) sum_period from gome_gmp_res_task k where k.pro_id = s.pro_id)*s.`schedule`/100)*100,1) from gome_gmp_res_task s where s.pro_id = p.pro_id ),0),'%') percentage, p.plan_time, (select user_name from gome_gmp_res_user where id = p.bp_id) bp_name FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u WHERE 1=1 AND p.bp_id=u.id and u.org_id=o.org_id AND p.schedule_id not in (0,5,7,9,10,11) AND p.is_commit=1 AND p.update_time >=#{startTime} AND p.update_time <=#{endTime} group by p.pro_id

select p.pro_id,p.title,(select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'statusId' and item_id = p.status_id) status_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = p.priority_id) priority_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'scheduleId' and item_id = p.schedule_id) schedule_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'actualize' and item_id = p.actualize) actualize_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(( select round(sum(work_period/(select sum(k.work_period) sum_period from gome_gmp_res_task k where k.pro_id = s.pro_id)*s.`schedule`/100)*100,1) from gome_gmp_res_task s where s.pro_id = p.pro_id ),0),'%') percentage, p.plan_time, (select user_name from gome_gmp_res_user where id = p.bp_id) bp_name FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u WHERE 1=1 AND p.bp_id=u.id and u.org_id=o.org_id AND p.is_commit=1 AND p.update_time >=#{startTime} AND p.update_time <=#{endTime} group by p.pro_id

SELECT p.pro_id,p.title,(select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'statusId' and item_id = p.status_id) status_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = p.priority_id) priority_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'scheduleId' and item_id = p.schedule_id) schedule_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'actualize' and item_id = p.actualize) actualize_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(( select round(sum(work_period/(select sum(k.work_period) sum_period from gome_gmp_res_task k where k.pro_id = s.pro_id)*s.`schedule`/100)*100,1) from gome_gmp_res_task s where s.pro_id = p.pro_id ),0),'%') percentage, p.plan_time, (select user_name from gome_gmp_res_user where id = p.bp_id) bp_name FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u WHERE 1=1 AND p.bp_id=u.id and u.org_id=o.org_id AND p.schedule_id =3 AND p.is_commit=1 AND p.update_time >=#{startTime} AND p.update_time <=#{endTime} group by p.pro_id

select p.pro_id,p.title,(select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'statusId' and item_id = p.status_id) status_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = p.priority_id) priority_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'scheduleId' and item_id = p.schedule_id) schedule_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'actualize' and item_id = p.actualize) actualize_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(( select round(sum(work_period/(select sum(k.work_period) sum_period from gome_gmp_res_task k where k.pro_id = s.pro_id)*s.`schedule`/100)*100,1) from gome_gmp_res_task s where s.pro_id = p.pro_id ),0),'%') percentage, p.plan_time, (select user_name from gome_gmp_res_user where id = p.bp_id) bp_name FROM gome_gmp_res_project p,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_user u WHERE 1=1 AND p.bp_id=u.id and u.org_id=o.org_id AND p.update_time >=#{startTime} AND p.update_time <=#{endTime} AND p.is_commit=1 group by p.pro_id

SELECT i.item_name name, count(p.schedule_id) num FROM gome_gmp_res_project p, GOME_GMP_DICT_ITEM i WHERE i.group_type = 'scheduleId' AND i.item_id = p.schedule_id and p.status_id=2 GROUP BY p.schedule_id ORDER BY p.schedule_id

SELECT p.pro_id,p.title,(select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'statusId' and item_id = p.status_id) status_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = p.priority_id) priority_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'scheduleId' and item_id = p.schedule_id) schedule_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'actualize' and item_id = p.actualize) actualize_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(( select round(sum(work_period/(select sum(k.work_period) sum_period from gome_gmp_res_task k where k.pro_id = s.pro_id)*s.`schedule`/100)*100,1) from gome_gmp_res_task s where s.pro_id = p.pro_id ),0),'%') percentage, p.plan_time, (select user_name from gome_gmp_res_user where id = p.bp_id) bp_name FROM gome_gmp_res_project p where 1=1 and p.schedule_id=#{scheduleId} and p.status_id=2

select onlineMonth,count(1) cnt,onlineYear from ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.update_time, '%Y-%m') onlineMonth, DATE_FORMAT(t.update_time, '%Y') onlineYear, pro_id,bp_id,pro_type FROM gome_gmp_res_project t WHERE t.is_commit=1 and t.schedule_id = 5 ) d, gome_gmp_res_user b, gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE d.bp_id = b.id and length(b.org_id) >= 4 AND o.org_id=left(b.org_id,4)
AND EXISTS (SELECT u.id FROM gome_gmp_res_user u,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_project p WHERE u.org_id = o.org_id AND u.id = p.bp_id and p.pro_id=d.pro_id and p.pro_type=#{proType} and
o.org_id LIKE CONCAT(#{item},'%')
)
and onlineYear = #{year} and d.pro_type=#{proType} group by d.onlineMonth order by d.onlineMonth

SELECT p.pro_id,p.title,(select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'statusId' and item_id = p.status_id) status_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'priorityId' and item_id = p.priority_id) priority_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'scheduleId' and item_id = p.schedule_id) schedule_name, (select item_name from gome_gmp_dict_item where group_type = 'actualize' and item_id = p.actualize) actualize_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(( select round(sum(work_period/(select sum(k.work_period) sum_period from gome_gmp_res_task k where k.pro_id = s.pro_id)*s.`schedule`/100)*100,1) from gome_gmp_res_task s where s.pro_id = p.pro_id ),0),'%') percentage, p.plan_time, (select user_name from gome_gmp_res_user where id = p.bp_id) bp_name from ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.update_time, '%Y-%m') onlineMonth, DATE_FORMAT(t.update_time, '%Y') onlineYear, pro_id,pro_type FROM gome_gmp_res_project t WHERE t.schedule_id = 5 and t.is_commit=1 ) pr,gome_gmp_res_project p, gome_gmp_res_user b, gome_gmp_res_org o WHERE p.pro_id=pr.pro_id and p.bp_id=b.id and length(b.org_id) >= 4 AND o.org_id=left(b.org_id,4)
AND EXISTS (SELECT u.id FROM gome_gmp_res_user u,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_project p WHERE u.org_id = o.org_id AND u.id = p.bp_id and p.pro_id=pr.pro_id and p.pro_type=#{proType} and
o.org_id LIKE CONCAT(#{item},'%')
)
AND pr.onlineMonth=#{month} AND pr.pro_type=#{proType} GROUP BY pr.pro_id

select DISTINCT(year) AS year from (
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.update_time, '%Y-%m') month, DATE_FORMAT(t.update_time, '%Y') year, pro_id FROM gome_gmp_res_project t WHERE t.schedule_id = 5 AND t.is_commit=1 ) d where EXISTS (SELECT u.id FROM gome_gmp_res_user u,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_project p WHERE u.org_id = o.org_id AND u.id = p.bp_id and p.pro_id=d.pro_id and o.org_id LIKE CONCAT('0','%')) group by month

select onlineMonth,count(d.pro_id) cnt,onlineYear from gome_gmp_res_project p, ( select CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time, '%m'),'æœˆ') onlineMonth, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time, '%Y') onlineYear, pro_id FROM gome_gmp_res_project t WHERE t.schedule_id = 5 and t.is_commit=1 ) d where 1=1
AND EXISTS (SELECT u.id FROM gome_gmp_res_user u,gome_gmp_res_org o,gome_gmp_res_project p WHERE u.org_id = o.org_id AND u.id = p.bp_id and p.pro_id=d.pro_id and
o.org_id LIKE CONCAT(#{item},'%')
)
and onlineYear = #{year} and p.pro_id=d.pro_id and p.pro_type=#{proType} group by d.onlineMonth order by d.onlineMonth
